verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As a people travail
In the heat of the sun,
There is hope in the victory of the Lord.
With a heat that is groaning,
The battle's begun
To recover, redeem and restore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So we fight for our brothers
And we fight for our sons,
Go up for our daughters and wives.
Fight for the house
For the battle's begun,
And cry victory in the name of our God,
And cry victory in the name of our God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though the night closes in
We remain on the wall
With a vision that shines like the day.
Though the rubble surrounds us,
Not one man shall fall,
For together we work and we say:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
With a spade in one hand
And a sword at our side,
The sound of the trumpet will call.
With our hearts trained for war
As the battle draws nigh,
We will fight at our place on the wall.
